Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~skarim ~smithbk Were you intending to keep CID in both places for a time period?

Action.author: yuki-kon
Action.body: Thanks, Keith. I will separate this JIRA into two parts: 1) Remove old cid package in the next release, 2) Fix the doc and samples to use the new location. I will make a new JIRA for #2 and submit a CR later.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Merged into master (v2.0) and tagged as release note is required.
